principles: Abundant natural light - lots of windows, good orientation
Architectural character - not boxy, interesting shapes and forms
Wood elements - exposed beams, hardwood flooring, natural wood features
Cozy warmth - brick fireplaces, natural materials
anti_principles: Dark interiors with poor natural light
Cheap flip finishes - gray laminate, basic white cabinets
Forest location with high fire risk
soft_constraints: Prefer cul-de-sac or quiet street location

dimensions.name: natural_light
dimensions.description: Quality and abundance of natural light - lots of windows, good sun exposure

dimensions.name: architectural_character
dimensions.description: Interesting architectural features and non-boxy design

dimensions.name: materials_quality
dimensions.description: Quality of visible materials - especially wood and natural elements

dimensions.name: layout_flow
dimensions.description: How well spaces flow and connect

dimensions.name: outdoor_space
dimensions.description: Quality of outdoor spaces and views

exemplars.reason: 10/10 - Great luminosity, great location, quirky Mediterranean style
9/10 - Wooden beams, brick fireplace, lots of light, great price
8/10 - Cul de sac location, good light, multiple stories
8/10 - Wood beams/flooring, light, not boxy (would be 10/10 without fire risk)

violation_patterns: Gray everything - gray laminate, gray cabinets, gray paint

location_preferences.preferred_areas: Soquel, Capitola, Santa Cruz, Los Gatos

notes: Bootstrapped from initial house ratings. Strongly values natural light, wood elements, architectural character. Dislikes boxy generic homes and fire risk locations.
